name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_SINGLE_LOW
description: You have sought glory in ten single-player battles, fight on!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_SINGLE_MED
description: You have fought in one hundred single-player battles!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_SINGLE_HIGH
description: You have fought in one thousand single-player battles!  Even Alexander the Great did not have your strength of will.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_NUM_WINS_LOW
description: Congratulations!  You have achieved the first multi-player victory of many to come.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_NUM_WINS_MEDIUM
description: You have been victorious in fifty multi-player battles - you are a seasoned veteran and a worthy opponent!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_NUM_WINS_HIGH
description: It has probably been a long time since you stopped counting your battles and victories but your fans (and foes) will remember.  This battle marks your five hundredth multi-player victory!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_MULTI_LOW
description: On this day you have fought in your tenth online battle!  Let the town bell ring and the villagers rest from their labors that they may toast your good health and leadership.   There will be many battles ahead, some victories, some defeats - but always lessons.  Cheers and congratulations to you on this auspicious day!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_MED
description: Today is a day of glory!  You have fought one hundred battles versus fierce online opponents.  Three cheers for you - hip hip, HUZZAH!  HUZZAH!  HUZZAH!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_HIGH
description: Today is a day of great celebration!  You have fought your one thousandth battle against online opponents.  Order a feast!  Make a toast to those who have defeated you as honorable teachers, make a toast to those foes you have defeated, and most of all a toast to your friends and allies who have supported you in your many campaigns.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_RANDOM_LOW
description: When you are ready to take on the unexpected you are ready to take on the world.  The Random map challenge is for any who are ready for attack or defense by land or sea and to defend against those who would threaten your empire.    Fight on!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_RANDOM_MED
description: You are master of the random map - from the thrill of exploration, to the skillful deployment of your villages, to the razing of the enemy and driving them from your borders.  Master of continents and oceans, your leadership is the stuff of song and legend!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_RANDOM_HIGH
description: You have fought on every type of map, against every type of opponent in history.  There may be those who will still stand against you, but they do so with respect.  Huzzah!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_TURBO_LOW
description: With turbo your villagers will gather and build quickly - pay attention to your resources and idle villagers. Turbo will let you focus more on your mid-game strategic planning.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_TURBO_MED
description: Now that you have played twenty games at turbo you probably have a feel for the pace and challenges.  Focus on pushing your early attacks even earlier to surprise your enemy and interrupt their build momentum.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_DEATHMATCH_LOW
description: Deathmatch is a competition of fast decisions and instant action.  It will hone your skills at pitched battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_DEATHMATCH_MED
description: Mastery of deathmatch is the ability to continuously make good decisions while building a sustainable economy under constant attacks.  You have demonstrated that ability by playing 50 games.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_DEATHMATCH_HIGH
description: After 300 battles if there is something to be learned in Deathmatch it is where to find opponents who will still agree to fight you.  Congratulations!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_SCENARIO_LOW
description: Each legendary leader has something to teach you, a tactic, a strategy, or an attitude - when you have fought their battles and studied their history you are taking steps to becoming a legendary leader yourself.  Congratulations!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_SCENARIO_MED
description: You have played your twentieth scenario, Congratulations!  What will the historians write about your battles?  Who were your greatest foes?  Were you more cunning or more bold?  Only time will tell.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_SCENARIO_HIGH
description: You have played fifty scenarios - Wonderful!  Each conquered world reveals more lessons and more challenges ahead.  All great leaders build their knowledge on the foundation of the stories of the legends that have gone before.   Cheers to you!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_KINGOFHILL_LOW
description: It isn’t taking the hill, it is holding it against all attackers that is the ultimate challenge. You are on your way.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_KINGOFHILL_MED
description: Life is short and brutal but legend is timeless, if you can master the strategies of King of the Hill you will be better prepared to take on anything that life throws at you.  You have battled the hill ten times, this will certainly not be the last.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_KINGOFHILL_HIGH
description: You have claimed one hundred hilltops!  The victor isn’t often the first one to the top, but the one that knows how to hold it once they are there.  You have demonstrated that knowledge.  Cheers to you!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_WONDERRACE_LOW
description: Wonder race is an exercise in building an economy quickly and efficiently - pay attention to balancing your economy and tasking those villagers and you will be victorious.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_WONDERRACE_MED
description: By now you know the shortest path to building a wonder quickly - and how to build up your economy in a hurry.  Focus on optimizing your gathering technologies and economy to surprise your opponents.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_WONDERRACE_HIGH
description: For many, the Wonder Race is a good way to learn how to tune an economy and know the short path to the Wonder for any civilization.  For you, the Wonder Race has its own appeal - a celebration of the empire builder’s art.  Congratulations!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_DEFENDWONDER_LOW
description: Wonder Defense is an excellent way for any leader to build their skills.  If you are defending then you must build your forces and reinforce your defensive structures quickly or attack offensively to reduce your opponent’s strength.  Attackers must be coordinated if they hope to succeed.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_DEFENDWONDER_MED
description: Few things are so satisfying as seeing the enemy’s wonder in flames, or defending your wonder to the last unit.  After ten Defend the Wonder battles you have certainly seen both.  Cheers to you!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_DEFENDWONDER_HIGH
description: You have demonstrated mastery of the Defend the Wonder style.  Cheers to you on your fiftieth challenge!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_NUM_MVP_AWARDS_LOW
displayName: You were the Most Valuable Player!
description: You have earned your first MVP award.  The Most Valuable Player in an Age of Empires II battle has the highest total buildings razed and enemy units killed on the team.  Aggressive attacks and thorough elimination of enemy buildings will increase your chances of earning additional MVPs.   Congratulations!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_NUM_MVP_AWARDS_MED
description: You have been selected for the Most Valuable Player award twenty times.  You have demonstrated great skill in battle, and surpassed that by outperforming the other generals in your allegiance.  You are definitely a rising star in this elite group.  Congratulations!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_NUM_MVP_AWARDS_HIGH
description: You have been selected for the Most Valuable Player award 100 times.  You have demonstrated great skill in battle, and surpassed that by outperforming the other generals in your allegiance.  You are definitely a rising star in this elite group.  Congratulations!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_BRITONS_LOW
description: You have led the Britons to victory ten times.  Fight on!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_BRITONS_MED
description: Master of the Longbow Archers, you have led the Britons to victory fifty times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_BRITONS_HIGH
description: You have led the Britons to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_FRANKS_LOW
description: You have led the Franks to victory ten times.  Fight on!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_FRANKS_MED
description: Master of the Heavy Calvary charge, you have led the Franks to victory fifty times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_FRANKS_HIGH
description: You have led the Franks to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_GOTHS_LOW
description: You have led the Goths to victory ten times.  Fight on!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_GOTHS_MED
description: Master of the Huskarls, you have led the Goths to victory fifty times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_GOTHS_HIGH
description: You have led the Goths to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_TEUTONS_LOW
description: You have led the Teutons to victory ten times.  Fight on!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_TEUTONS_MED
description: Master of the power of the garrison and well versed in defensive building, you have led the Teutons to victory fifty times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_TEUTONS_HIGH
description: You have led the Teutons to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_JAPANESE_LOW
description: You have led the Japanese to victory ten times.  Fight on!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_JAPANESE_MED
description: Master of the Samurai, you have led the Japanese to victory fifty times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_JAPANESE_HIGH
description: You have led the Japanese to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_CHINESE_LOW
description: You have led the Chinese to victory ten times.  Fight on!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_CHINESE_MED
description: Master of both the Chu Ko Nu crossbows and advanced learning, you have led the Chinese to victory fifty times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_CHINESE_HIGH
description: You have led the Chinese to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_BYZANTINES_LOW
description: You have led the Byzantines to victory ten times.  Fight on!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_BYZANTINES_MED
description: Master of the Cataphracts, you have led the Byzantines to victory fifty times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_BYZANTINES_HIGH
description: You have led the Byzantines to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_PERSIANS_LOW
description: You have led the Persians to victory ten times.  Fight on!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_PERSIANS_MED
description: Master of the War Elephants, you have led the Persians to victory fifty times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_PERSIANS_HIGH
description: You have led the Persians to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_SARACENS_LOW
description: You have led the Saracens to victory ten times.  Fight on!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_SARACENS_MED
description: Master of the Mamelukes, you have led the Saracens to victory fifty times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_SARACENS_HIGH
description: You have led the Saracens to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_TURKS_MED
description: Master of the Janissaries, you have led the Turks to victory fifty times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_TURKS_HIGH
description: You have led the Turks to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_VIKINGS_LOW
description: You have led the Vikings to victory ten times.  Fight on!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_VIKINGS_MED
description: Master of the Berserker and the Longboat units, you have led the Vikings to victory fifty times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_VIKINGS_HIGH
description: You have led the Vikings to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_MONGOLS_LOW
description: You have led the Mongols to victory ten times.  Fight on!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_MONGOLS_MED
description: Master of the Mangudai, you have led the Mongols to victory fifty times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_MONGOLS_HIGH

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_CELTS_MED
description: Master of the Woad Raiders, you have led the Celts to victory fifty times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_CELTS_HIGH

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_SPANISH_LOW

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_SPANISH_MED
description: Master of the Conquistadors and Mounted Monks, you have led the Spanish to victory fifty times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_AZTECS_LOW
description: You have led the Aztecs to victory ten times.  Fight on!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_AZTECS_MED
description: Master of the Jaguar Warriors, you have led the Aztecs to victory fifty times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_AZTECS_HIGH

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_MAYANS_LOW
description: You have led the Mayans to victory ten times.  Fight on!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_MAYANS_MED
description: Master of the Plumed Archers, you have led the Mayans to victory fifty times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_MAYANS_HIGH
description: You have led the Mayans to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_HUNS_LOW
description: You have led the Huns to victory ten times.  Fight on!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_HUNS_MED
description: Master of the Tarkans, you have led the Huns to victory fifty times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_HUNS_HIGH
description: You have led the Huns to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_KOREANS_LOW
description: You have led the Koreans to victory ten times.  Fight on!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_KOREANS_MED
description: Master of the War Wagon, you have led the Koreans to victory fifty times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_KOREANS_HIGH
description: You have led the Koreans to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_RANDOM_LOW
description: Choosing ‘Random’ for your civilization is a good boast.  You are confidently telling the world that you can lead any civilization to victory!  Cheers to you!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_RANDOM_MED
description: After twenty five victories, you have shown that you truly can lead any civilization to glory.  You are truly a timeless commander!  (And you can probably converse with villagers in several languages.)

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_RANDOM_HIGH
description: After a hundred victories playing random civilizations, your reputation is truly secure.  Any civilization, any era, any map.  Just bring it!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_BRITONS_LOW
description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Britons in battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_BRITONS_MED
description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Britons.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_BRITONS_HIGH
description: You have now defeated the Britons one hundred times in battle!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_FRANKS_LOW
description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Franks in battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_FRANKS_MED
description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Franks.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_FRANKS_HIGH
description: You have now defeated the Franks one hundred times in battle!

description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Goths in battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_GOTHS_MED
description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Goths.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_GOTHS_HIGH
description: You have now defeated the Goths one hundred times in battle!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_TEUTONS_LOW

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_TEUTONS_HIGH

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_JAPANESE_MED
description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Japanese.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_JAPANESE_HIGH
description: You have now defeated the Japanese one hundred times in battle!

description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Chinese.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_CHINESE_HIGH

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_BYZANTINES_HIGH

description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Persians.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_PERSIANS_HIGH

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_SARACENS_HIGH

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_TURKS_HIGH

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_VIKINGS_HIGH

description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Mongols in battle.

description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Mongols.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_MONGOLS_HIGH
description: You have now defeated the Mongols one hundred times in battle!

description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Celts in battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_MED_LOW
description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Celts.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_CELTS_HIGH
description: You have now defeated the Celts one hundred times in battle!

description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Spanish.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_SPANISH_HIGH

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_AZTECS_HIGH

description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Mayans.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_MAYANS_HIGH

description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Huns in battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_HUNS_MED
description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Huns.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_HUNS_HIGH
description: You have now defeated the Huns one hundred times in battle!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_KOREANS_LOW
description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Koreans in battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_KOREANS_MED
description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Koreans.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_KOREANS_HIGH
description: You have now defeated the Koreans one hundred times in battle!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_RANDOM_LOW
description: You have faced the unknown!  Playing against random opponents will expose you to a world’s worth of variety of units, tactics, and technologies.  Study their strengths and weaknesses to become a great leader.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_RANDOM_MED
description: You have defeated random opponents twenty five times. Your legend grows greater with every victory.  Congratulations!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_RANDOM_HIGH
description: You have faced the random opponents and defeated them two hundred and fifty times.  No civilization can find safety when they stand against you.  Congratulations!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_EVERY_CIV
description: You have won at least one victory against every civilization in Age of Empires II.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_UNITS_KILLED_LOW
description: You have killed over fifty units in  a single session.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_UNITS_KILLED_MED
description: You have killed over 500 units in a single session - your fame will spread from this point onward.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_UNITS_KILLED_HIGH
description: You have killed over two thousand units in a single session.  You are a legend to both allies and enemies.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_UNITS_LOST_LOW
description: Sometimes to win battles you have to make hard choices and sacrifices.   In this battle you lost 25 units to combat with the enemy.  Sometimes an outdated unit can get a needed boost of speed or armor with the right technology.   Get used to watching the alerts on your mini-map as well - a second attack is easy to miss once you are defending the first one. Use this tactic to your advantage as well.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_UNITS_LOST_MED
description: Over one hundred of your units were lost in this battle - even with such great losses, if they were well used against the enemy you did the right thing.  Get used to studying the battle stats after each match with an opponent - did you have the right complementary mix of units?  Did you make your enemy pay for every one of your losses?  Every unit sacrificed is an opportunity to learn about your opponent.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_UNITS_LOST_HIGH
description: Two hundred of your units were lost in this conflict.  Sadly, not every battle can be a sweeping victory where everyone returns to the feast table to boast of their skill.   Sometimes, being a good general is about knowing when to throw everything against the enemy without reservation or hesitation.  Today you know how that feels.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_UNITS_CONVERTED_LOW
description: Civilizations can be conquered with ideas as surely as with armaments.  You can celebrate your success this battle in converting enemy units.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_UNITS_CONVERTED_MED
description: The communication of ideas and religion was a powerful force that changed empires in the Middle Ages.  Your conquest of 20 enemies in a single battle shows great skill at deploying and protecting the priests.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_UNITS_CONVERTED_HIGH
description: You have demonstrated mastery of the conversion strategies by converting over fifty enemy units in a single match.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDINGS_RAZED_LOW
description: You razed 50 buildings in this campaign, your enemies will think twice before challenging you again.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDINGS_RAZED_MED
description: In this campaign you razed over 100 buildings, your name is legend among your enemies.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDINGS_RAZED_HIGH
description: No wall nor castle will stand in your way - you have clearly mastered the siege by razing over 250 buildings in one session.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDINGS_LOST_LOW
description: For some leaders, losing 15 buildings in a single session would be a reason to retreat and resign.  Not you.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDINGS_LOST_MED
description: For some leaders, losing 50 buildings in a single session would be a crushing defeat - as long as you have wood and villagers you will carry on.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDINGS_LOST_HIGH
description: Some leaders might aspire to build one hundred buildings in their entire reign.  You lost that many this day and fought on valiantly.  Stay strong!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WONDERS_BUILT_LOW
displayName: Creation of your first Wonder of the World
description: You have constructed a wonder - a shining pinnacle of achievement for your civilization.  It is a beacon of hope to people everywhere, and if defended - a legacy of that achievement to stand the test of time.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WONDERS_BUILT_MED
description: Few leaders can master both the economy needed to construct a wonder, let alone build a strong military or alliances to defend it.  As a veteran of Five Wonders you have demonstrated those skills.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WONDERS_BUILT_HIGH
description: One Wonder is a pinnacle achievement for any ruler.  You have constructed fifty Wonders of the World through your many campaigns through history.  Clearly you are a master of building a strong economy and support structure.  You are clearly a leader in the Age of Empires.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CASTLES_BUILT_LOW
description: The Castle was the premiere fortification of the Medieval period.  Your legacy  in the future is assured.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CASTLES_BUILT_MED
description: In your various campaigns through history you have constructed over one hundred castles.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CASTLES_BUILT_HIGH
description: On this day you have created your thousand’th castle.  Huzzah!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CAMPAIGN_WALLACE_COMPLETED
description: “We come here with no peaceful intent, but ready for battle, determined to avenge our wrongs and set our country free. Let your masters come and attack us: we are ready to meet them beard to beard.” - (1297) William Wallace

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CAMPAIGN_JOANARC_COMPLETED
description: “Of the love or hatred God has for the English, I know nothing, but I do know that they will all be thrown out of France, except those who die there.” - Joan of Arc (Trial 1431)

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CAMPAIGN_SALADIN_COMPLETED
description: By studying the campaigns of Salah al Din Yusuf ibn Ayyub, or 'Saladin' as he was known to the crusaders, you can know that there are many aspects to the great heroes of the Middle Ages. The lessons of his campaigns will guide you in your other conquests.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CAMPAIGN_KHAN_COMPLETED
description: His enemies know only the ruthlessness and speed of the great Khan’s conquests - but the greatest generals also know the tools of cooperation, alliance, and loyalty - these will serve you well in future campaigns.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CAMPAIGN_BARBAROSSA_COMPLETED
description: In study of the campaigns of Frederick Barbarossa you learned the power of relics and of uniting an empire. Use this knowledge in your future conquests, but remember not to overextend yourself.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CAMPAIGN_ATTILA_COMPLETED
description: Attila knew both great betrayal and great glory in his conquests against the Romans. Attila said: “It takes less courage to criticize the decisions of others than to stand by your own.” - Carry his example on to your other campaigns.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CAMPAIGN_ELCID_COMPLETED
description: Throughout his conquests, El Cid was far more than a master at arms and noble, but was someone who could lead and unite the people. Even beyond his death, the legacy of his leadership was still more powerful than lesser rulers. Take his lessons with you on your own conquests.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CAMPAIGN_MONTEZUMA_COMPLETED
description: By following along with Cuauhtémoc in the battles against Cortés you have used alliance building and subtlety in addition to your skills in battle. Skillful use of forces and alliances can overcome the greatest odds. Remember these lessons in your next conquest.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CAMPAIGN_CONQUERERS_COMPLETED
displayName: Battles of the Conquerors Campaign Completed
description: Through study of these diverse battles and leaders you have mastered skills that will be useful in all of your future conquests. Fight with the piety of Charles Martel, the bravery of Alp Arslan, and the calculating tactics of Hideyoshi to ensure success in your campaigns.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ALL_AOK_CAMPAIGNS_COMPLETED
description: You have successfully completed all of the story campaigns of Age of Empires II: The Age of Kings and Age of Empires II: The Conquerors Expansion. Successful leaders use many techniques to build their empires. Your careful study of the greatest of these men and women has given you new powers and abilities to build future empires.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GAMES_PLAYED_TURBO_HIGH
description: You are an expert at the Turbo style, your decision-making under time pressure is legendary.  Congratulations to you, Lightning General!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_SPANISH_HIGH
description: You have led the Spanish to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_CPU_OPPONENTS_1
description: Congratulations! You have defeated a single CPU opponent (at moderate difficulty or higher).

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_CPU_OPPONENTS_2
description: Congratulations! You have singly defeated two CPU opponents (at moderate difficulty or higher).

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_CPU_OPPONENTS_3
description: Congratulations! You have singly defeated three CPU opponents (at moderate difficulty or higher).

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_CPU_OPPONENTS_4
description: Congratulations! You have singly defeated four CPU opponents (at moderate difficulty or higher).

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_CPU_OPPONENTS_5
description: Congratulations! You have singly defeated five CPU opponents (at moderate difficulty or higher).

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_CPU_OPPONENTS_6
description: Congratulations! You have singly defeated six CPU opponents (at moderate difficulty or higher).  Not many can claim this level of skill.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_CPU_OPPONENTS_7
description: Congratulations! You have singly defeated Seven CPU opponents (at moderate difficulty or higher).  World champions will often play against seven CPU opponents on Hard difficulty as a warm-up before tournaments.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_UNITS_CONVERTED_CAREER_LOW
description: Every successful conversion is doubly beneficial to your team - you remove an enemy attacker and increase your own forces.  In your career you have successfully converted fifty units.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_UNITS_CONVERTED_CAREER_MED
description: Over the span of your career, you have successfully converted over five hundred of your enemies to your cause!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_UNITS_CONVERTED_CAREER_HIGH
description: You have dedicated yourself to bringing your civilization's religion to your foes.  Very few generals have the patience and wisdom to manage the priest units so effectively as you have.  This is indeed a day of celebration - you have converted one thousand opposing units in your career.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDINGS_RAZED_CAREER_LOW
description: You have crumbled your five hundredth building into rubble…and you are just getting warmed up.   Congratulations!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDINGS_RAZED_CAREER_MED
description: You have razed five thousand buildings in your long and illustrious military career!  If your reputation went up as quickly as you take buildings down you would be known world-wide.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDINGS_RAZED_CAREER_HIGH
description: You have razed ten thousand buildings in your long and illustrious military career!  You can unpack trebuchets in your sleep and you consider a dozen fire archers a pleasant introduction.  You are a legend!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDINGS_LOST_CAREER_LOW
description: In your career you have lost over one thousand buildings.  Everything is a milestone, every win, every loss, and every building that falls.  Great generals count their losses and learn from them.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDINGS_LOST_CAREER_MED
description: In your career you have lost over ten thousand buildings.  Buildings, like miles spent on horseback are excruciating at first but just mark the passage of time before long.  If you celebrate with a cake, just put one candle on it and start working on your next ten thousand.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_BUILDINGS_LOST_CAREER_HIGH
description: Sure, generals say that every unit lost is mourned and every building razed is avenged - but after fifty thousand even the most obsessive counter gives up.  You have seen civilizatons rise and fall endlessly - it is time to stop counting the buildings.   Congratulations that you persevere, mighty leader.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_HOSTED_GAME
description: You hosted a multiplayer game for the first time!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_PREORDER
displayName: Dark Ages Rush or Early Adopter

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_INCAS_LOW
description: You have led the Incas to victory ten times.  Fight on!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_INCAS_MEDIUM
description: Master of the Kamayuk, you have led the Incas to victory fifty times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_INCAS_HIGH
description: You have led the Incas to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_INDIANS_LOW
description: You have led the Indians to victory ten times.  Fight on!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_INDIANS_MEDIUM

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_INDIANS_HIGH
description: You have led the Indians to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_ITALIANS_MEDIUM
description: Master of the Genoese Crossbowman, you have led the Italians to victory fifty times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_ITALIANS_HIGH
description: You have led the Italians to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_MAGYAR_LOW
description: You have led the Magyars to victory ten times.  Fight on!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_MAGYAR_HIGH
description: You have led the Magyars to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

description: Master of the Boyar, you have led the Slavs to victory fifty times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_SLAVS_HIGH
description: You have led the Slavs to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_INCAS_LOW
description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Incas in battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_INCAS_MEDIUM
description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Incas.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_INCAS_HIGH
description: You have now defeated the Incas one hundred times in battle!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_INDIANS_LOW
description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Indians in battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_INDIANS_MEDIUM
description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Indians.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_INDIANS_HIGH
description: You have now defeated the Indians one hundred times in battle!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_ITALIANS_LOW
description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Italians in battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_ITALIANS_MEDIUM
description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Italians.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_ITALIANS_HIGH
description: You have now defeated the Italians one hundred times in battle!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_MAGYAR_LOW
description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Magyars in battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_MAGYAR_MEDIUM
description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Magyars.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_MAGYAR_HIGH
description: You have now defeated the Magyars one hundred times in battle!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_SLAVS_LOW
description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Slavs in battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_SLAVS_MEDIUM
description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Slavs.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_SLAVS_HIGH
description: You have now defeated the Slavs one hundred times in battle!

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CAMPAIGN_ALARIC_COMPLETED
description: Through toil and perseverance, you have found a new home for Alaric's people, showing even mighty Rome that the Goths are a force to be reckoned with. Use your migratory skills and resilience to find a new home, recover, and succeed in your future aims even when the present looks bleak.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CAMPAIGN_DRACULA_COMPLETED
description: Vlad Dracula was a harsh, sometimes cruel ruler, but one could not argue the success of his methods. The only man of his time able to stand against the might of the Ottomans, Vlad showed that patriotism, charisma, and proper tactics could overcome all odds. Vlad also made a point to be strict but fair. Remember that advice when ruling your empire.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CAMPAIGN_BARI_COMPLETED
description: The Nautikos family valued its home greatly, and its family history and heritage instilled a drive in its heirs to bring glory to their house. Their exploits, though somewhat forgotten, are a source of pride to their descendants. That pride is a fine attribute, but it is best tempered with prudence and ethic. Take that advice on your future conquests.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CAMPAIGN_SFORZA_COMPLETED
description: Rising from a lowly soldier to Duke of Milan, Sforza did more than make his father’s spirit proud. Use the traits of military leadership and tactics that you have learned in this campaign to find success in your future battles, and remember that it is better to be feared than loved. - Machiavelli (The Prince 1513)

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CAMPAIGN_ELDORADO_COMPLETED
description: Orellana and his loyal followers faced more than their own fears and superstitions on their navigation of the Amazon. To overcome the adversity that stood in their way, they had to work as a unit and not as individuals. Remember those principles of unity and selflessness on your future campaigns.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CAMPAIGN_PRITHVIRAJ_COMPLETED
description: The subject of veneration of many of his descendants, Prithviraj was shrewd, brave, honest, but also prone to emotion, taking many risks for the sake of love. Even in the sight of war and possible death, remember to enjoy your life to the fullest, for you only live once. A complete and moral life deserves the most remembrance.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CAMPAIGN_BATTLES_FORGOTTEN_COMPLETED
displayName: Battles of the Forgotten Campaign Completed
description: Through your inquiry into the detail of some of the less-known but equally significant historical clashes of arms, you have shown that you are truly a master of the pen and the sword. Rule with the strength of the sons of Ragnar, the diplomatic aptitude of Khosrau Anushirvan, the steadfastness of Minamoto no Yoritomo, and the charisma of Osman Ghazi.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ALL_FORGOTTEN_CAMPAIGNS_COMPLETED
description: You have successfully completed all of the story campaigns of Age of Empires II: The Forgotten Expansion. Through your trials and successes in these clashes of arms, you surely have mastered all spheres of empire-building and rule, and are ready to start building your own legend. “Cattle die, kindred die, every man is mortal: But the good name never dies of one who has done well.” -Havamal (Poetic Edda 1220)

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_PORTUGUESE_LOW

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEATED_PORTUGUESE_MEDIUM

name: ACHIEVEMENT_VICTORY_PORTUGUESE_HIGH
